00129             function                download( $Options )
00130             {
00131                   try
00132                   {
00133                         $FileInputAlgorithms = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00134                         $FileDescription = $FileInputAlgorithms->get_by_id( $this->Security->get_gp( 'fid' , 'integer' ) );
00135                         
00136                         $FileSize = filesize( get_field( $FileDescription , 'file_path' ) );
00137                         $FileName = get_field( $FileDescription , 'original_file_name' );
00138                         
00139                         header( 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK' );
00140                         header( 'Content-type: application/octet-stream' );
00141                         header( "Content-Length: $FileSize" );
00142                         header( "Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=\"$FileName\"" );
00143                         header( 'Connection: close' );
00144                         
00145                         readfile( get_field( $FileDescription , 'file_path' ) );
00146                   }
00147                   catch( Exception $e )
00148                   {
00149                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00150                   }
00151             }
00152             
00171             function                view( $Options )
00172             {
00173                   try
00174                   {
00175                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'download' , false ) )
00176                         {
00177                               $this->download( $Options );
00178                         }
00179                         
00180                         return( '' );
00181                   }
